projects.name: Internal Web Application
tasks: Single page application for managing/updating project metadata
API integration/CRUD operations for dynamic rendering based on provided JSON schema and user interaction

projects.name: Web Application
tasks: Single page application providing bespoke user experience and content
API integration/CRUD operations for managing user authorization, accreditation, and preferences

projects.name: Internal Command Line Tool
tasks: Retrieve and format data from web sources provided by partners to be ingested by machine learning API

projects.name: Multimedia UI Component
tasks: Lightweight, responsive solution for use on top of legacy websites and as a stand-alone application to dynamically render text, audio, and static image content as multimedia accreditation activity

projects.name: Web Applications
tasks: Single page application framework for dynamically rendering content across multiple sites/domains
API integration/CRUD operations for managing user authorization, accreditation, and preferences
Support both web browser and hybrid iOS platforms

projects.name: Website
tasks: Responsive website for submitting queries and rendering responses for use in hybrid iOS app and to showcase @POC’s machine learning API

projects.name: Internal Command Line Tool (NodeJS Middleware)
tasks: Request large datasets from legacy service and transform into discrete datasets for consumption across multiple platforms and applications

projects.name: User Authentication UI
tasks: Responsive HTML form for authenticating users across multiple platforms, applications, and websites

projects.name: Media Player UI
tasks: Responsive UI for medical accreditation activities integrating audio, video and static images into multi-media playlists/presentations

projects.name: Web Applications
tasks: Implement and maintain responsive UI across web applications dynamically rendered using a hybrid stack of JavaScript/jQuery and PHP
Introduce Sass build process to help “componentize” styling of reusable UI elements across web applications
